# How to configure visibility in Delightree?

## In Delightree, you can control visibility for all content.

Visibility refers to a user's ability to view content in Delightree.

**Visibility settings can be configured for:**

- Folders and Sub-folders
- Chapters
- Training Paths
- Forms

### How to configure visibility settings?

![Screen Shot 2024-03-18 at 4.03.20 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%204.03.20%20PM.png?width=393&height=354&name=Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%204.03.20%20PM.png)1\. Click on the three dots on the top right-hand corner of the folder or chapter, then click 'visibility'. Same step applies for forms, training, etc.

2\. Here, you can view the current visibility settings of the folder and make changes by selecting 'Edit'.

![Screen Shot 2024-03-18 at 4.05.43 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%204.05.43%20PM.png?width=688&height=434&name=Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%204.05.43%20PM.png)

3\. Within the Edit window, the visibility settings offer three options for configuration.

- Public
- Same as Parent (folder)
- Custom

By selecting 'Custom', users have the option to tailor visibility settings according to location, job role, or specific user preferences.

![Screen Shot 2024-03-18 at 4.12.43 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%204.12.43%20PM.png?width=688&height=694&name=Screen%20Shot%202024-03-18%20at%204.12.43%20PM.png)

If you need help setting user configurations, please reach out to your Customer Success Manager for assistance.
